reviews.positive_text:
Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour dans cet hôtel, véritable havre de paix. Tout était parfait : la chambre, le confort, l’accueil, la propreté, le spa, le parking facile d'accès, sans oublier la décoration soignée qui ajoute au charme du lieu.
Le dîner au restaurant de l’hôtel fut également un régal, une véritable parenthèse gourmande.

La patronne, d’une gentillesse rare, nous a accueillis avec beaucoup de chaleur – tout comme sa petite chienne bulldog, adorable compagne des lieux.

C’est avec grand plaisir que nous reviendrons, et nous ne pouvons que recommander cet établissement pour un séjour aussi raffiné qu’agréable.
reviews.negative_text: Petit clin d’œil : dommage que le deuxième bulldog ne soit pas une femelle… notre chien n’a d’yeux que pour les dames ! 😉

reviews.review_title: Notre séjour a été inoubliable, alliant un accueil chaleureux, des installations exceptionnelles comme la grande piscine
reviews.positive_text:
nous avons particulièrement apprécié au MGM Alexane, c’est l’accueil chaleureux et le professionnalisme du personnel qui ont établi d’emblée une atmosphère accueillante et conviviale. Les installations, telles que la piscine intérieure spacieuse, le spa, le hammam, et la salle de fitness bien équipée, offrent un cadre parfait pour la détente et le bien-être, quel que soit le temps à l’extérieur. Les activités proposées, y compris le cinéma, le billard, et les fléchettes, garantissent divertissement et plaisir en toute occasion.

La navette facilitant l’accès aux pistes de ski est un service appréciable qui maximise le confort de séjour pour les amateurs de ski. De plus, les soins de massage proposés sur place ajoutent une dimension luxueuse à l’expérience, permettant une relaxation profonde après une journée active. La collaboration avec le restaurant Fabio enrichit également l’expérience culinaire, offrant des petits déjeuners et dîners savoureux dans un cadre agréable et pratique.

Notre suite, conjuguant luxe et confort avec un balcon offrant des vues apaisantes, a été un véritable refuge de tranquillité. La coquetterie et la gaieté quotidienne de Petula ont apporté une note charmante à notre séjour. Dans l’ensemble, le MGM Alexane a dépassé nos attentes, alliant à la perfection service exceptionnel, installations de qualité et options de divertissement variées, ce qui nous laisse impatients de planifier notre prochain séjour.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Loved it, it's a really relaxed hotel and very friendly.  Easy access to everything in Samoen.
reviews.positive_text:
The hotel exceeded our expectations, the staff were so friendly and helpful with all of our requests - booking/recommending restaurants, room requests.  Our rooms were together and a really good size, lots of storage  and a balcony.  They had an excellent system for our rooms together (I don't know if this is the same for all rooms)  - there is one door which leads to a hallway and then the two rooms are either side of the hallway.  We were then able to lock the main door and have the two bedroom doors unlocked.
The facilities were really good - pool, hot tub, gym (good but not excellent), communal areas, car park.  The hotel is right in the village so it's easy to go out.  We really enjoyed our 3 nights there.
reviews.negative_text: There wasn't a bar/cafe available  that we could see so couldn't get a coffee, tea or pre dinner drink.  We didn't ask at reception so you may be able to get this.  The road was right outside our windows and it was very quiet during the night but could be a bit noisy first thing in the morning.  This didn't really bother us but next time I would request a room higher up and on the other side of the hotel.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Deluxe avec Accès au Spa

reviews.negative_text: I found the pillows uncomfortable, although the bed was very comfortable.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text:
The room was beautiful (room 30)
As the snow conditions were not good we were able to enjoy the hotel without being cooped up in just one room
reviews.negative_text: We loved everything
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text:
Staff were lovely, available and accommodating for all our requests. They just get it.
Breakfast is basic but to be honest it was ok. You can order more and Fabio restaurant was the alternative place within the building with more options which was communicated well as we were the one of a few guests 
Spacious apartment with 3 showers, 2 en-suites. Warm and cozy.
Live music in the week nights (French Jazz) marvellous 
Town is quaint and small to walk around with beautiful little boutique shops and ski shops all overlooked by glorious mountains.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing. A great week
reviews.room_name: Suite Familiale - Appartement avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: Great location in centre of village, luxurious, attentive staff.
reviews.negative_text: Nothing!
reviews.room_name: Suite Familiale avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Top class hotel , real pity about breakfast.
reviews.positive_text: The hotel is excellent, the rooms , the facilities the location , the shuttle service , the resort is lovely , but very little apres ski ( one bar only) its a place for couples & families. Good range of places to eat , but you have to book .
reviews.negative_text:
Breakfast only thing that let hotel down , not great choice and at £19 PP not great value , we only had it once , it seems like a bit of after thought and is not run by hotel. The small attached cafe was a better option. If they could sort breakfast out would truly be an exceptional hotel. 

The main bar was hardly ever open and lacked atmosphere, maybe as we were there at end of season but only night people were there was when they had an excellent pianist on , the bar was really busy that night , thought they were really missing a trick , no apres ski at all.
The restaraunt attached was really good , but was run under separate ownership, so you could not add onto room bill.
reviews.room_name: Suite - Appartement Exécutif en Duplex avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: Amazing hotel, super staff
reviews.negative_text: Didn’t like communal toilet at restaurant
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: Lovely hotel, everything seemed very new and clean, the self catered apartment provided everything needed for a week long ski holiday for 4 adults and a 4 year old. Perfect location for the village centre and the gondola to the slopes. Lovely spa/pool area that both us adults and our 4 year old could enjoy.
reviews.negative_text: We didn't rate the breakfast but that didn't affect our stay as there were other options (self catered breakfast, ordered in pastries from the local bakery).
reviews.room_name: Suite - Appartement Exécutif en Duplex avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text:
Great spa.
Great location
Friendly and helpful staff
reviews.negative_text: Bar opening hours
reviews.room_name: Chambre Deluxe avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Overall, unfortunately not a great experience given the cost.
reviews.positive_text: Nice location & facilities and relatively new. Comfortable.
reviews.negative_text:
I thought I booked an apartment, but apparently I booked a suite, which was quite expensive and didn’t meet my needs for an apartment. I requested if an apartment was available but was told none were available despite its not appearing busy and many apartments appeared empty.
The suite was below the hotel laundry room and was noisy especially in the evening/night time.
The bed side light fitting fell off, the bathroom sliding door handle came off, and the shower head needed cleaned (was spraying in different directions). The double bed was 2 mattresses pushed together which often came apart.
The breakfast was very disappointing (hot food was cold) given it cost 20 euro per person, we ended up either eating elsewhere cheaper or just buying croissants and having coffee in room.
The evening restaurant was atrocious - had to wait 1 hr 40 mins for our meal to arrive, and portion was very underwhelming, considering what we got at other restaurants. Restaurant Staff were very not very understanding or apologetic.
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Great location , great hotel great staff
reviews.positive_text: Great staff especially on reception and at bar - Fabio cafe is excellent
reviews.negative_text: Nothing really - lighting in restaurant to bright for me
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: We stayed at this hotel a few years ago and hope to return again soon. Facilities and rooms are very good.

reviews.review_title: Luxurious retreat for a great price
reviews.positive_text:
The design is fantastic. Warm wood, great materialisation, very good value for money! The staff is very friendly.

Tho hotel offers a good parking garage. And the Spa and Swimming Pool were from proper size.

Over-all, we were very satisfied with our stay.
reviews.negative_text: Some minor things, the restaurants in the hotel and the nearby area were not very good.

reviews.positive_text: Staff is very kind and welcoming !!!! Great facilities !! Suites are large and well equipped!

reviews.review_title: Awesome hotel for a skiing stay, good location and great spa zone
reviews.positive_text: The hotel is fantastic, new, and clean, with a really cool atmosphere. Check-in is a bit late at 5 pm, but we managed to check in 2 hours early. After checking out, you can still fully enjoy the hotel's amenities. It's very close to the Grand Massif Express lift, which has free, ample parking, but there's also a complimentary hotel shuttle available every day except Saturday. If you're up for it, you can even walk there. The hotel offers underground parking and is centrally located, close to various eateries—I recommend the burger joint La Canette—and ski rental shops. However, the real game-changer is the fantastic spa area with a pool, jacuzzi, and two saunas, perfect for unwinding after a day on the slopes.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast are not included. You can order it in the nearby restaurant but the price is high (around 20 euro) and we did not go for it. But the day before you can order at the reception variety of pastries from the bakery and it was a good alternative. Pillows could be a more comfy.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Deluxe avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: great pastries in the morning
reviews.negative_text: nothing
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Hotel, amazing view, great facilities, family suite was perfect.
reviews.negative_text: no air conditioning in the room. which I imagine is not a problem 99% of the time, but it was above 30degrees celsius for the entire 10 days we were there.
reviews.room_name: Suite Familiale - Appartement avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: All is perfect
reviews.negative_text: Nothing
reviews.room_name: Suite Familiale avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text:
The hotel has the amenities, as free WiFi, a fitness center, and a spa.
The kitchenette had everything you could think of, including a fridge, wine fridge, stovetop, microwave, and sink. 
The location of the hotel is also great. It was close to many restaurants and stores, so we could easily find everything we needed. There were also plenty of places to visit and things to do in the area.
reviews.room_name: Suite - Appartement Exécutif avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Great facilities and views, however we won't be returning.
reviews.positive_text: Great facilities and views, however we won't be returning.
reviews.negative_text: The breakfast and restaurant facilities of this hotel where the let down. They are supposedly a separate business however you enter via the hotel on all angles, the staff where very rude and confrontational, this is a known problem in the hotel as we complained and where told we where the 4th people to complain that week. The issues with breakfast had a knock on affect as we ended up having to use our hotel room as an apartment without any facilities (kitchen sink/plates/fridge and so on) plus there is no room service which you would expect at a hotel of this standard. Also we stayed for 8 days and the room was only cleaned twice, the second time after I complained to the front desk.
reviews.room_name: Suite Familiale avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Fantastic hotel with everything you need
reviews.positive_text: One of the best hotels I’ve stayed in - luxurious, comfortable, big rooms, great facilities, lovely attentive staff, good breakfast, fantastic location! Couldn’t fault the hotel or the staff.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: The hotel is beautifully designed and well maintained. Furnishing is top-notch. Every piece of furniture is well chosen and of high quality. The bed is super comfy!  The spa and wellness centre is better than that of many 5 star hotels. Staff were so friendly and thoughtful. They even brought a birthday gift for our one-year old! Un grand merci! Samoens is a very pretty town with many old charming buildings. The river, the lake area, the dramatic mountain view and many easy but picturesque trails in the area suit families with small kids in particular.
reviews.room_name: Suite Confort avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: Incredible staff, could not do enough to help, amazing hotel. Spotlessly clean, modern and gorgeous rooms and a really top class spa. Right in the middle of town, super easy to get to everything and the most brilliant 'on demand' lift service to the gondola morning and afternoon. Cannot fault. We will be back next year. Thank you Alexane!
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.negative_text: nothing
reviews.room_name: Suite Confort avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: Excellent hotel in a fantastic resort. We will definitely stay here again
reviews.positive_text: Great location for all levels of skiing

reviews.positive_text:
Shuttle service ideal, as well as ski room and spa facilities at the end of the day.
Staff were all exceptionally helpful and friendly on a variety of matters.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast should really be included in the price, particularly given the limited options in the village.

reviews.negative_text: The jacuzzi was not very warm and the hotel facilities were not very obvious and confusing to find.

rooms very spacious and the lounge was a fab addition
beds super comfortable too

reviews.review_title: Super Alpine stay that has everything
reviews.positive_text:
Perfect short stay for our father daughter Alpine road trip. Loved the reception/bar area with log fire , the spa/fitness facilities and central village location all fantastic. Everything was immaculate and clean. 
All the staff were super helpful and welcoming.
reviews.negative_text: The bar closes early some nights, which cut short enjoyment of the lovely reception area. Although bottles of wine only can be purchased.

reviews.positive_text: Das Hotel und das Personal waren super! Sehr schönes Hotel das gut liegt. Das Personal war auch sehr freundlich.
reviews.negative_text:
Leider war der Sauna bereich schrecklich denn es war alles voller Kinder. Die Saunas und die Dampfbäder waren voll von Kinder. Es war also wirklich nicht um sich auszuruhen. Wir waren leider nur einmal da. Es war auch eiskalt im Schwimmbereich.
Der Wifi war schrecklich der ging fast nie.
Im Zimmer hatten wiir Schimmel im Kühlschrank, das wurde aber sofort geputzt als ich etwas gesagt habe. So wie ich sagte das Personal ist super!
Das Restaurant Fabio fand ich auch ganz schrecklich. Das Essen ist wirklich nicht gut! Wir waren am letzten Abend dort essen und hatten uns gefreut und es war schrecklich! Der erste Gang hatten wir zurück gegeben weil es wirklich nicht gut war und das Fleisch ganz zeh und das zweite war leider nicht besser. Ich habe noch nie so schlecht in einem Restaurant gegessen.
Sehr schade für so ein schönes Hotel
reviews.room_name: Chambre Deluxe avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: В целом, все.
reviews.negative_text: Проблема с едой в городе в целом. Трудно попасть в рестораны, включая отельный. Детей трудно накормить!

reviews.negative_text: Im SPA- Bereich kann man sich nicht entspannen. Eltern kommen mit ihren Kindern, und es ist eine Stimmung wie im Hallenbad. Leider gibt es keine Kontrollgänge seitens des Hotels, um dies zu kontrolieren.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Deluxe avec Accès au Spa

reviews.review_title: מלון נחמד, אבל לא ענה על הציפיות שלנו עד הסוף
reviews.positive_text: אהבנו את החדר עצמו, קבלת הפנים והמיקום בעיירה.
reviews.negative_text:
הזרם של המים במקלחת היה ממש חלש
המים בבריכה היו קרים מדי, צריך כמה מעלות יותר  כדי שיהיה נעים להיות בה.
הבריכה ושאר מתקני  הספא נסגרים ב-20:00, שעה ממש מוקדמת למלון באזור שמטיילים בו עד מאוחר.
reviews.room_name: Suite Confort avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text:
מיקום המלון מעולה. במרכז העירה ולב האטרקציות שבאיזור.
החדר היה ענק ונח.
היתה מרפסת נעימה ושימושית הפונה לנוף.
יש במלון חיבור chrome cast לטלוויזיה וזה נחמד.
יש במלון סינמה פרטית צריך להזמין מקום מראש.
reviews.negative_text:
ארוחת הבוקר איננה חלק מהמלון היא בסיסית מאד ולא נותנת תמורה למחיר.
הספא נראה מאד יפה ויוקרתי אבל המים בברכה קרים וגם בג'קוזי קרים ביחס למצופה הסאונה נהדרת.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Supérieure avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text: Reservamos en el hotel una habitacion familiar con dos habitaciones, cocina y salón. Tenía dos baños completos y un aseo. Superbien equipada con todo lo necesario para nuestra estancia. Garaje privado cubierto de dos plantas. Sala de juegos, cine, piscina cubierta. Y al llegar de las excursiones se agradece la zona spa con sauna, hammam e hidromasaje incl. en la estancia. Cerca de todo: del Montblanc,Ginebra y Annecy. Paisaje de ensueño y cocina savoyard con quesos deliciosos. Personal atento y muy amable. En especial la directora fué muy cariñosa con nosotros y nuestra mascota.
reviews.negative_text: Nos gustó absolutamente todo. No hubo nada aue entorpecio la estancia. Pero pensamos que la zona spa necesitaría un poco de control para que los menores no accedan en zonas peligrosas para ellos, en especial sin vigilacia
reviews.room_name: Suite Familiale - Appartement avec Accès au Spa

reviews.positive_text:
Ein Hotel das keine Wünsche offen lässt. Mit viel Liebe und Charme ist das ganze Hotel und auch unser Zimmer ausgestattet gewesen. Dazu ein tolles Wellness und sehr gutes Essen. Absolut genial! 
Auch eine Einstellhalle zum einstellen der Motoräder war vorhanden. TOP!!!
reviews.negative_text: nichts!

reviews.positive_text: Die Executive Suite ist sehr gross, sauber und ideal für Familien.  Das ganze Hotel ist sehr gut ausgestattet und sauber. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich, zuvorkommend und schnell. Unserer Familie hat der Aufenthalt sehr gefallen. Wir werden bestimmt noch einmal Buchen
